mapper.select: SELECT a.branch_code AS ID , B.GROUP_CODE_NAME || B.CODE_NAME || B.DESCRIPTION AS placeName , A.LATITUDE AS Y , A.LONGITUDE AS X , A.ROAD_ADDRESS || A.STREET_ADDRESS AS addressName , '서비스,산업 > 전문대행 > 렌터카' AS distance , A.TEL AS phone , '' AS placeUrl FROM RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH A INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE B ON A.BRANCH_CODE = B.FULL_code WHERE B.GROUP_CODE_NAME || B.CODE_NAME || B.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{placeName} || '%'
